title: Business Case for Reducing Carbon along the Value Chain.
bodyText: Climate Ambassadors should know and be able to communicate the business case for reducing carbon along the value chain. The module provides that business case – in three principal areas: Revenue, Risk, and Reputation.  The module covers:

bulletPoints: Relating Business Case to Climate Goals
